snippet: Mr. Cruz, who for much of the Republican primary season praised Mr. Trump as a force for good, unburdened himself as never before in a searing, personal barrage hours before the Indiana primary.
abstract: Mr. Cruz, who for much of the Republican primary season praised Mr. Trump as a force for good, unburdened himself as never before in a searing, personal barrage hours before the Indiana primary.

headline.main: Ted Cruz Unburdens Himself: ‘What I Really Think of Donald Trump’
